EmailTemplate.name: Brief Intro Convo
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! and Welcome to QuickBooks Enterprise
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great speaking with you today. Here are the benefits that youâ€™ll have access to during the Enterprise Onboarding Process to ensure the successful installation and implementation of your QuickBooks Enterprise software.
Onboarding Account Manager: My name is Chadwick Farrell and I will be your primary contact for everything Intuit. Please reach out to me for all your business needs.
Direct Phone Number: the phone number connecting directly to me. I can be reached Monday through Friday, 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM PST at (800) 498-7401 ext. 1447.
Installation: Our Installation Experts will take you step-by-step through the process of getting the new software installed on you systems.
Training: Your Onboarding Manager will assist you in customizing our training program to meet your specific needs.
We at Intuit value your business and are continuously working to improve the experience we provide to our valued customers and are excited to offer you this new benefit.
I look forward to working with you.
Chadwick Farrell ~ Account Manager Intuit ~ Simplify the business of life Work Phone: 800-498-7401 ext 1447
This transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
